alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 02 at 2:12PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of Alabama, including the following counties, Baldwin and Escambia. portions of northwest Florida, including the following county, Escambia. * WHEN...Until 415 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 112 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Atmore, Bratt, Nokomis, Malta, Freemanville, Perdido, Canoe, Phillipsville, Robinsonville, Dyas and Wawbeek. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
